titleInfo.title: Political cartoon, "Certainly, We'll Shoulder Our Part"

mods.abstract: Joe Parrish political cartoon shows tall Uncle Sam carrying an oversize bundle labeled, "Uncle Sam's Relief Burden." Standing next to him is a tiny image of President Franklin D. Roosevelt holding a much smaller bag labeled, "Our Local Community Chest Duty." The cartoon is one of many in a scrapbook kept by young Henry McRaven. Parrish signed the opening page.
mods.accessCondition: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
